text: Attended a briefing of products offered during Industrial Transformation event recently. The person who attended to me was knowledgeable and was able to share details well. Products are in line with catering to the latest needs in the industry.
Cool place with cool robots the tour guide also knows what he's talking about, a good place for someone who is interested in robots and ai

I was impressed by LHK Precicon boothâ€™s demonstration today at ITAP in Singapore. The staff was very friendly and knew how to explain their cybersecurity and sustainability applications in details. I was especially proud to see the Schneider Electric solution showcased there. Thanks for showing your work to me!

One groups of Ngee Ann Polytechnic Common Engineering Programme (CEP) Students Visited on 10 May 2023. Exposure to automation solution is great, staff are very cordial! Thank you all Omron staff helped in this learning journey!
Great introduction on the products functionality.
